You are blameless and cleared of any wrongdoing, and I know that you didn't commit this crime. You are guilt-free and innocent, and I am so proud of you for standing strong and fighting for your innocence.

I know that you were wrongfully accused and that the system can sometimes fail us, but in this case, justice has been served and you have been cleared of all charges. You are not at fault and did not commit any crime, and I will always stand by you and support you no matter what.

I love you so much, my darling, and I am so grateful that we can put this ordeal behind us and move on with our lives. You are a wonderful person, and I know that you will continue to be a positive force in the world.
